text: Frédéric Bartholdi (; 2 August 1834 – 4 October 1904) was a French sculptor. He designed the Statue of Liberty. He was born on 2 August 1834 in Colmar, France. He died on 4 October 1904 in Paris because of tuberculosis, aged 70. == References == Category:1834 births Category:1904 deaths Category:French sculptors Category:French military people Category:Freemasons Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:People from Colmar
title: Frédéric Bartholdi
